name: Firewall (Riley, Recktless)
description:
When your user insists on opening popups and clicking shady links, it's up to you to defend the computer. You are the Firewall, a security program taking care of your haphazard user by preventing bugs and viruses from affecting the rest of the computer. Build up your defenses and keep the bugs away!

Before each wave, place blocks to impede enemy movement using your resources. When you're ready, click "End Build Phase" to enter fps mode and defend against the bugs. Defeating bugs will get you more resources to build more blocks between waves.

Build Mode:
LMB - Place Block
RMB - Remove Block
WASD - Pan
QE - Rotate
Scroll Wheel - Zoom

FPS Mode:
LMB - Shoot
WASD - Move
Space - Jump

Made for Extra Credits Jam#6, the theme was "Take Care". Also attempted the Extra Retro challenge of using a 4-color palette.

Web Playable Build to be added after rating period for the jam ends.
